member.name: T:ACE.BIT.ADEV.CarWash.CarWashItem
member.summary: Represents a car wash service item.

member.name: P:ACE.BIT.ADEV.CarWash.CarWashItem.Description
member.summary: Gets and sets the description of the car wash item.

member.name: P:ACE.BIT.ADEV.CarWash.CarWashItem.Price
member.summary: Gets and sets the price of the car wash item.

member.name: M:ACE.BIT.ADEV.CarWash.CarWashItem.CompareTo(ACE.BIT.ADEV.CarWash.CarWashItem)
member.summary: Compares the description of this CarWashItem to the specified CarWashItem.
member.param: The CarWashItem to compare to this one.
member.returns:
A 32-bit signed integer that indicates whether this instance precedes, follows, or appears in the same position in the sort order as the value parameter.
Less than zero: This instance precedes value.
Zero: This instance has the same position in the sort order as value.
Greater than zero: This instance follows value.

member.name: M:ACE.BIT.ADEV.CarWash.CarWashItem.ToString
member.summary: Returns the String representation of the CarWashItem.
member.returns: The String representation of the CarWashItem.
